topics.body:
I think I'd rather be in bloodborne's universe than dark souls

Being a beast could be kinda neat

Being undead is shitty all the way around
topics.author: 500b587e7f123b1f230014a9

topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5525bf73636872076f9f0400#post_5525bf73636872076f9f0400
Honestly I agree. 

The fucking Dark Souls universe sounds super shitty and fucked up.

Its like CONGRATULATIONS! *YOUR AN UNDEAD CORPS!*

And if you keep dying you'll turn into an EVEN MORE undead corps! And you'll lose all your memories! AND YOU'LL STILL BE ALIVE AND YOU'LL SUFFER! *FOREVER*
